alert.note: Alert for Howard; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:49PM CDT until May 12 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Howard County in western Texas... East central Martin County in western Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Lomax, or 11 miles west of Big Spring, moving north-northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knott. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 166 and 172. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
